mapper.sql: id, plan_config_id, dict_lottery_type, status, stage_count, total_stage_count, amount, double_count, total_amount, win_amount, profit_amount, execute_index, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan(plan_config_id, dict_lottery_type, status, stage_count, total_stage_count, amount, double_count, total_amount, win_amount, profit_amount, execute_index, create_time, update_time) values (#{planConfigId}, #{dictLotteryType}, #{status}, #{stageCount}, #{totalStageCount}, #{amount}, #{doubleCount}, #{totalAmount}, #{winAmount}, #{profitAmount}, #{executeIndex}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan
plan_config_id = #{planConfigId},
dict_lottery_type = #{dictLotteryType},
status = #{status},
stage_count = #{stageCount},
total_stage_count = #{totalStageCount},
amount = #{amount},
double_count = #{doubleCount},
total_amount = #{totalAmount},
win_amount = #{winAmount},
profit_amount = #{profitAmount},
execute_index = #{executeIndex},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan where id in (${ids})
mapper.insert: insert into yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan_history(id, plan_config_id, dict_lottery_type, status, stage_count, total_stage_count, amount, double_count, total_amount, win_amount, profit_amount, execute_index, create_time, update_time) select from yjcycc_lottery.bs_plan where plan_config_id = #{planConfigId}
